reviews.review: It's a solid asymmetrical PvP game. The horror aspect wears off pretty soon and is replaced by salt. The worst part of this game (like a lot of PvP games like League of Legends) is the community. Take my advice and ignore chats and avoid the forums and reddit - cesspools of toxicity and whining.
not enjoyable, do not recommend it after the latest update
Un juego que hará ver las adicciones como algo del pasado.
Um baita game, tem alguns bugs, longe da perfeição, mas tem melhorado bastante a longo prazo, faltam jogadores, existem demoras nas filas.

ゲーム自体はとても面白いがその面白さを潰すレベルで運営のバランス調整がヘタクソです。
生存者と殺人鬼に分かれて試合を行う4対1の非対称対戦ゲームですが本当にテストプレイをしているのか疑わしいレベルで殺人鬼側を蔑ろにした調整となっており、そのため殺人鬼側をプレイする人間がどんどん減少しており長時間マッチングしません。
更にランクマッチ制度を採用しているにも関わらず殺人鬼をプレイする人間が少なすぎて長時間マッチングせず、その状況を解決するためにランクを無視したマッチングを行うため長時間プレイしいる熟練の生存者に対して初心者の殺人鬼があてがわれるため更にゲームバランスが崩壊し、殺人鬼不足を加速させています。
このゲームをプレイするのであれば相当な暇人か理不尽に耐えられる強い精神が必要でしょう、私は暇人でした。
ゲーム自体は面白いので非常に残念です。
Broke my laptop 3 times playing this game 10/10 great pallet physics.

I recommend this game to anyone who likes a 1v4 survival horror game it's just like any other first person shooter but... Only you and the other 3 don't have weapons and the killer has a melee weapon. (If you rage a lot you don't want to play on pc. Play on PS4 or Xbox.)

Only 158 hour in the game and the only thing that really made me toxic as a survivor was Hex: Ruin but they're even changing that. Fun game overall.

The issues with this game:

Connection-wise, you'll get kicked out of a lobby 25% of the time and get a ban penalty.
You'll face hackers.
Balance wise, favors survivor heavily.
Ranking system is broken, you will face rank 1 "Survivor with friends" groups that will bully you as you just start the game.
The developers encourage toxicity by implementing challenges that require you to ignore your team and play selfishly. 
As a killer you never want to camp unless it's mandatory for that specific moment because the survivors will finish fixing all the generators before the guy on the hook dies. However, some challenges require you to camp because well, there's no other way for instance: "Sacrifice X survivors during end game collapse", end game collapse is when the gates are actually powered. You will gain more points not camping even at that stage of the game, however due to this challenge requiring you to actually complete the sacrifice, you have no choice but to camp.

EDIT: I just found out that using some items in the game will get you banned, no brainer there, apparently they prefer to ban people than fixing the issues.
If you think : "Oh today I"ll come home, play some dead by daylight and such" you build your killer, and hey you stumbled upon a glitch and you got recorded? (Which btw getting recorded in this game is very common since there are a lot of hackers) you're gonna get banned and you will be accused of pretense if you claim you didn't know.

Re-consider your life choises before buying this garbge ass game. There s only 1 gameplay for survivor and that is; getting downed buy the killer and get campped. For killer; The survivors click their flashlights, tea-bag at the exit gate, and write ez in the end game chat. That's it don't buy this garbage

После патча 5.3.0 ( тотемы на сурвов) баланс умер, дать 2 хита за маньяка = 1 стадия исцеления сурва. За выжившего думать не надо(если просто делаешь цель в игре, а не фан), просто чинишь генераторы и прыгаешь в окошко, когда за маньяка думаешь и потеешь. Пешие маньяки - полумертвые, каждая игра зависит не от того на сколько ты хорошо играешь на том или другом мане,  а на сколько сурв умеет вокруг палеты бегать.
/
/
/
